name: Birdie Bomber
description:
Made in 10 hours for Game-A-Week Game Jam, Theme: birds with arms.

Bomb the city... as a bird with arms!  Try to bomb as many buildings as you can!

Credits:

Trevor Baughn - Programming / Design / Art
quobodup - Sound

Brandon Morris - Sound
